name: Iron Will
description: You are more resistant to mental effects.
benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Will saving throws.
mythicBenefit: Whenever you roll a Will saving throw against a spell, spell-like ability, or supernatural ability from a non-mythic source, roll twice and take the higher result.
description_zh: 你有超乎常人的坚强意志。
benefit_zh: 所有意志豁免获得+2加值。
